> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift keeps his supplies minimal and keeps only what is essential for
> the mission.  Once doing that he slips back into beast mode as he too,
> prepares to go topside.
>
> " I'm tell'n ya Polarclaw, that tower's been hacked and whoever the hacker
> is, is gonna wish they minded their own business when we get through with
> 'em."

<NEW>

POLAR CLAW nodded, "You might be right kid, but we won't know for
sure." His voice was gruff but not unkind as he climbed up out of the
shuttle and onto the snow shifting into his beastmode - a polar bear.

WOLFGANG shifted into his wolf mode as RAMULUS became an Ibex. "Piece
of cake." WOLFGANG said with his usual exuberance.

"Prowl, give us some aerial recon." POLAR CLAW said as he looked at
the mountains ahead of them.

PROWL nodded as he became a transmetal owl and leaped into the air
flying upwards.

"The rest of you, let's move." POLAR CLAW's voice was that of a
leader, gruff. confident and commander.

Up above, in the mountains, a hundred or so feet above the group there
was a small pass that would allow them through.

OOC: Airly, go ahead and insert Perceptor if you want him in here with
this group. if not he can be at the Ark.

- Preston
